file_content.text: So many lost for my freedom....
I met Master Oteg. He left to inform Republic High Command of the casualties. They're devastating.
Half the fleet destroyed... Master Oteg killed by a direct hit on this vessel. Devastating casualties.
I'm just glad we have powerful allies to replace what's been lost. We'll need all of you to defeat the Sith Empire.
I've defeated quite a few Sith Lords lately. The enemy is weakening.
I'm doing my part.
If I'd had you with me when I faced the Emperor... things might have gone differently.
Havoc Squad never quits until the job's done.
Count on me, sir.
That end is coming, my friend. Sooner than you think.
The Empire's always underestimating me. Makes it easy to sneak up behind and clock 'em good.
Especially me.
Unlikely heroes have always been my favorite kind.
My only consolation is to see the Jedi still produce great warriors. Wish I'd had you at my side when I faced the Emperor.
We'll get our chance at him, someday. When we do, I won't let you down.
We would've won.
Knowing you're the vanguard of our order gives me hope.
You're a powerful Jedi--one of the greatest I've ever seen. Your strength will be needed for the war ahead.
As a Jedi, I strive for peace. But if war comes, I'm prepared to fight it.
I'm ready to face the enemy.
You remind me of old friends, long gone.
Your survival gives me hope. I've served with many soldiers. None were your equal.
I won't let that kind of talk go to my head--not while the Empire's still standing, anyway.
I'm just a trooper, sir.
With you on the front lines, we'll win.
Your skill with a blaster is impressive. You should enlist in the Republic military, where it can do more good.
A uniform won't make me a better shot. Besides, I'm not so good at following orders.
Thanks, but no thanks.
Neither am I. Probably why I like you.
There's room on my ship for you. We'll defeat the Empire together.
Let's team up.
It isn't my place to follow or lead. I'll travel my own path, like always.
Having a three-hundred-year-old Jedi Master in my debt will be useful.
You owe me your life.
The only payment I can offer is peace. I won't stop until the Sith are only a memory.
My link to the Emperor is broken, but I learned a lot as his prisoner. Centuries of knowledge.
I'll share everything with the Jedi Council. Then, I'll end this blasted war--and the Sith Empire--forever.
If you need allies, you can always call on me.
I'll help you however I can.
You gave me freedom. That's more than enough.
That won't be easy.
The galaxy won't be safe until every Sith and Imperial is dead.
Wipe them all out.
The Sith are the true enemy. Remove them completely, and only Imperial slaves remain. They'll surrender.
There's one secret the Emperor never pried from me: a place called the Foundry. In the wrong hands, it can exterminate civilizations. In my hands, it will save the galaxy.
You should return to the fight, for as long as it lasts.
Before I go... who was that woman who led us to you?
Tell me about the dead Jedi.
She was a great Jedi. My most trusted ally. History remembers her as the Exile. To me, she was... more.
We were never properly introduced in all the excitement. What should I call you?
I never got your name.
Revan. It isn't my real name--never was--but it will do.
Try to stay out of Imperial prisons this time, all right?
Well, it's been a thrill.
Your shuttle to Tython is fueled and ready, my friend. It's time.
Goodbye. I won't forget what you did today.
Neither will I. You not only saved him, but you helped spare the fleet additional losses.
The Republic needs all the fleet admirals and Jedi Masters it can get. Stay safe, all right?
Take care, Oteg.
There's nothing safe about the path I walk. I'll do my best.
It was nothing special.
Humility is good--in moderation. Sometimes you just have to accept you're a hero.
Speak kindly of me to others.
The crews know who saved them. You'll never have to buy yourself a drink on any ship in this fleet.
Thanks to you, we've taken a great step toward final victory over the Empire. May the Force be with you.
I'm leaving for Tython. I hope we meet again someday. May the Force be with you.
The Empire will fall. It must.
